908824b8-1370-4a0b-8034-26fe88d2e240.name: Social Stigma (Barbarian)
908824b8-1370-4a0b-8034-26fe88d2e240.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction by Barbarians

8000bad9-3fd6-4a3b-a80a-2abc4ffdcb6b.notes: -1 Reaction, -2 for cops & judges after public denouncement or visible sign

1d63baaa-5930-49b6-bf33-3ef2e2046152.name: Social Stigma (Perceived as an Animal)
1d63baaa-5930-49b6-bf33-3ef2e2046152.notes: No intellectual respect; killing you is not a crime

460ff469-102d-4493-bddc-987fd2ddad03.name: Reaction Bonus
460ff469-102d-4493-bddc-987fd2ddad03.notes: Military officers, tribal war-leaders, soldiers, and other professional warriors

e3508d91-d49f-40ba-a8c7-f3270464d082.notes: Bonus to initiative rolls if leader
